name: Worm game!
description:
Entry for LOWREZJAM 2019. Play a low-res version of Snake, complete with singleplayer, local multiplayer, and amateur sound, art, and music.

For single player, objective is to grab the flag.

For multiplayer, be the last worm standing. If one worm crashes into the other, it dies. If both crash head first into each other, the longer worm wins.

Eat fruit, have fun!
